childrenComponentProp.name: value
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Currently selected date value

description.text: Currently selected date value

childrenComponentProp.name: disabled
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Whether the component is disabled or not.

description.text: Whether the component is disabled or not.

childrenComponentProp.name: dateFormat
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A date format as a string. Check out date-fns's format option for syntax.

description.text: A date format as a string. Check out date-fns's format option for syntax.

childrenComponentProp.name: minDate
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A minimum date. Anything prior to it will be disabled.

description.text: A minimum date. Anything prior to it will be disabled.

childrenComponentProp.name: maxDate
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A maximum date. Anything after it will be disabled.

description.text: A maximum date. Anything after it will be disabled.

childrenComponentProp.name: placement
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Sets the direction of the calendar overlay.

description.text: Sets the direction of the calendar overlay.

childrenComponentProp.name: onChange
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Callback invoked when the date changes.

description.text: Callback invoked when the date changes.

components.docblock: Date Range Picker Component that shows a dropdown where you can select a date range.

childrenComponentProp.name: value
childrenComponentProp.docblock: An object that can contain either a window or start/end dates.

description.text: An object that can contain either a window or start/end dates.

childrenComponentProp.name: minDate
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A minimum date. Anything prior to it will be disabled.

description.text: A minimum date. Anything prior to it will be disabled.

childrenComponentProp.name: maxDate
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A maximum date. Anything after it will be disabled.

description.text: A maximum date. Anything after it will be disabled.

childrenComponentProp.name: disabled
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Whether the component is disabled or not.

description.text: Whether the component is disabled or not.

childrenComponentProp.name: dateFormat
childrenComponentProp.docblock: A date format as a string. Check out date-fns's format option for syntax.

description.text: A date format as a string. Check out date-fns's format option for syntax.

childrenComponentProp.name: ranges
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
An object with labels as keys and tuples shaped as [startDate, endDate] as values. Those will be used as
the window ranges that will be available for selection. See getDatePickerRanges function for more info.
For disabling ranges, set this to empty list.

description.text:
An object with labels as keys and tuples shaped as [startDate, endDate] as values. Those will be used as
the window ranges that will be available for selection. See getDatePickerRanges function for more info.
For disabling ranges, set this to empty list.

childrenComponentProp.name: inputRanges
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
An object with labels as keys and an object shaped as {interval, endDate} as values. Those will be used as
the input ranges that will be available for selection. See getDatePickerInputRanges function for more info.
For disabling input ranges, set this to empty list.

description.text:
An object with labels as keys and an object shaped as {interval, endDate} as values. Those will be used as
the input ranges that will be available for selection. See getDatePickerInputRanges function for more info.
For disabling input ranges, set this to empty list.

childrenComponentProp.name: placement
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Sets the direction of the calendar overlay.

description.text: Sets the direction of the calendar overlay.

childrenComponentProp.name: numCalendarMonths
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The amount of calendar months that will be rendered.

description.text: The amount of calendar months that will be rendered.

childrenComponentProp.name: calendarDirection
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The direction of calendar months. This is only relevant when you have more than one as numCalendarMonths.

description.text: The direction of calendar months. This is only relevant when you have more than one as numCalendarMonths.

childrenComponentProp.name: disabledDates
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
A list of dates that will be disabled for selection. For the purpose of specifying a valid selection interval,
use minDate and maxDate props instead.

description.text:
A list of dates that will be disabled for selection. For the purpose of specifying a valid selection interval,
use minDate and maxDate props instead.

childrenComponentProp.name: onChange
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Callback invoked when the date range changes. This function is invoked with an object that can contain either
a window or start/end dates.

description.text:
Callback invoked when the date range changes. This function is invoked with an object that can contain either
a window or start/end dates.
Date Range Picker Component that shows a dropdown where you can select a date range.

components.docblock:
Generalized Form Control component.

Different component types are usable via the as parameter.  When component is undefined, it'll
default as a text field.  Other options:
 - textarea
 - select (but use the SelectField component instead)

childrenComponentProp.name: input
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Original input field passed by the React Form

description.text: Original input field passed by the React Form

childrenComponentProp.name: label
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Input field label

description.text: Input field label

childrenComponentProp.name: help
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Help text used to describe the field's purpose

description.text: Help text used to describe the field's purpose

childrenComponentProp.name: disabled
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Whether the field is disabled or not.

description.text: Whether the field is disabled or not.

childrenComponentProp.name: meta
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Metadata object that is passed by the React Form

description.text: Metadata object that is passed by the React Form

childrenComponentProp.name: as
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Custom element type for this field

description.text: Custom element type for this field

childrenComponentProp.name: onChangeValue
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Callback function that returns the value of the input when it's changed

description.text: Callback function that returns the value of the input when it's changed

Generalized Form Control component.

Different component types are usable via the as parameter.  When component is undefined, it'll
default as a text field.  Other options:
 - textarea
 - select (but use the SelectField component instead)

components.docblock:
Year and Month Picker Component that shows a dropdown where you can select a
specific month in year.

childrenComponentProp.name: value
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Year-Month value, needs to be formated like this: YYYY-MM(2019-11)

description.text: Year-Month value, needs to be formated like this: YYYY-MM(2019-11)

childrenComponentProp.name: disabled
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Whether the component is disabled or not.

description.text: Whether the component is disabled or not.

childrenComponentProp.name: placement
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Sets the direction of the calendar overlay.

description.text: Sets the direction of the calendar overlay.

childrenComponentProp.name: onClose
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Callback invoked when the overlay menu closes. This function is invoked with
formatted string value, year and month arguments.

description.text:
Callback invoked when the overlay menu closes. This function is invoked with
formatted string value, year and month arguments.

childrenComponentProp.name: onChange
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Callback invoked when either month or year value changes. This function is invoked with
formatted string value, year and month arguments.

description.text:
Callback invoked when either month or year value changes. This function is invoked with
formatted string value, year and month arguments.

Year and Month Picker Component that shows a dropdown where you can select a
specific month in year.

childrenComponentProp.docblock: Fields object passed by the React Form

description.text: Fields object passed by the React Form

childrenComponentProp.name: label
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Input field label

childrenComponentProp.name: help
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Help text used to describe the field's purpose

childrenComponentProp.name: disabled

childrenComponentProp.name: meta
childrenComponentProp.docblock: Metadata object that is passed by the React Form

description.text: Metadata object that is passed by the React Form

childrenComponentProp.name: emptyMessage
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The element/text that will be displayed when no element exist

description.text: The element/text that will be displayed when no element exist

childrenComponentProp.name: innerComponent
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The component that will be rendered as an element

description.text: The component that will be rendered as an element

childrenComponentProp.name: labelDefault
childrenComponentProp.docblock: This label is used in the default renderKey prop. It is the prefix used in the element name

description.text: This label is used in the default renderKey prop. It is the prefix used in the element name

childrenComponentProp.name: addTooltip
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The tooltip that will be displayed when hovering over the add button

description.text: The tooltip that will be displayed when hovering over the add button

childrenComponentProp.name: minimizable
childrenComponentProp.docblock: If elements are able to be minimized or not

description.text: If elements are able to be minimized or not

childrenComponentProp.name: initiallyMinimized
childrenComponentProp.docblock: If a minimizable component should be initially minimized or not

description.text: If a minimizable component should be initially minimized or not

childrenComponentProp.name: duplicable
childrenComponentProp.docblock: If elements are able to be duplicated or not

description.text: If elements are able to be duplicated or not

childrenComponentProp.name: renderLabel
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
A function that receives the value object and its index and returns an element to be displayed as the element
header

description.text:
A function that receives the value object and its index and returns an element to be displayed as the element
header

childrenComponentProp.name: initialFieldValue
childrenComponentProp.docblock: The initial field object that should be used when onAdd is not defined.

description.text: The initial field object that should be used when onAdd is not defined.

childrenComponentProp.name: onAdd
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Callback function that transforms and adds a new element. If not defined, initialFieldValue will be used
instead. Callback receives no argument and should return the new object object.

description.text:
Callback function that transforms and adds a new element. If not defined, initialFieldValue will be used
instead. Callback receives no argument and should return the new object object.

childrenComponentProp.name: onDuplicate
childrenComponentProp.docblock:
Callback function that transforms the current element into a duplicated one and adds it. Callback receives
the current object as argument and should return the new object.

description.text:
Callback function that transforms the current element into a duplicated one and adds it. Callback receives
the current object as argument and should return the new object.
Component that renders a section field array using the provided innerComponent prop as its elements.
